textos_fuente.text: Who We Are | The Miami Group top of page HOME WHAT WE DO WHO WE ARE CONTACT ARTICLES BUSINESS CERTIFICATIONS More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. About The Miami Group Our Mission: To help businesses reach their next level of excellence Our History Millie Herrera, MBA, founded and leads The Miami Group & Associates, Inc, a boutique management and business consulting firm headquartered in Miami, Florida. The Miami Group was born in 2000 as a business and public affairs consulting firm. Initially, all three founders had full time jobs in the corporate, law and government sectors and ran the company on a part time basis. Within the first year, two of the founders amicably left the company to continue their professional careers, and Millie remained as sole owner and president. ​ Our Expertise The Miami Group provides strategic planning and marketing strategies consulting, business certification, IT business analysis & project management, and corporate development to achieve organizational excellence for our Clients. ​ What makes us unique is the depth and breadth of our expertise. Throughout our company's history, we have served small to medium and corporate clients in diverse industries, from banking and insurance corporations, to food importers, IT services providers, wholesale distributors, attorneys, global fruit distributors, non-profit organizations, international purchasing agents of oil and mining exploration machinery, construction trades and manufacturing, to name a few. ​ We partner with our Clients to identify their challenges and goals, create strategies for success, and put in place actionable, measurable objectives and processes to arrive at higher levels of operational excellence and profit. ​ We collaborate with other professional experts to create the best teams possible with the right expertise for each Client and project. ​ Our Commitment We are results driven and provide our Clients the best possible personalized, reliable and trusted services to exceed their expectations in all we do. HOME WHAT WE DO WHO WE ARE CONTACT ARTICLES BUSINESS CERTIFICATIONS More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. The Miami Group & Associates, Inc. 2222 Ponce de Leon Blvd Coral Gables, FL 33134 +1-305-972-4162 info@themiamigroup.com © Copyright The Miami Group & Associates, Inc. Our concept marks the spirit of the cultural diversity that Miami has. We want to honor our Hispanic roots and at the same time celebrate the union of different cultures and traditions. For more information, please contact us with the details below: Contact Email: admin@pilonmiami.com × Map View Get Directions Cancel Pilón Miami Specialties Latin American Food Join Our Newsletter Click to Subscribe We make your business everyone's business! You may opt-out by replying STOP or reply HELP for more information. Message frequency varies. Message and data rates may apply. You may review our Privacy Policy to understand how your data is used. Let's Talk *Required Fields Phone Sales: 305-407-2832 Service: 305-712-6905 Parts: 305-712-6900 Body Shop: 305-423-4523 Address Headquarter Toyota 5895 NW 167th St. Hialeah, FL 33015 Hours and Directions Total Suggested Retail Price (SRP) The SRP reflects suggested retail pricing and includes factory-installed options, distributor-installed features, and predelivery service charges or handling charges. SRP is subject to change at any time without notice. Taxes, title, license, dealer-installed accessories, and service fees are not included. The final sale price will vary based on these factors. New Car Disclaimer Fees All advertised prices from Headquarter Toyota exclude tax, title, license, registration, and the following fees: $1,094 predelivery service charge, $54.75 electronic registration filing fee, and a Third party $13 private tag agency fee. Prices also do not include any optional accessories selected by the customer. Used Car Disclaimer Fees All advertised prices from Headquarter Toyota exclude tax, title, license, registration, and the following fees: $1,094 predelivery service charge, $54.75 electronic registration filing fee, and a Third party $13 private tag agency fee. Prices also do not include any optional accessories selected by the customer. Dealer-Installed Options Dealer-installed accessories refer to items added to the vehicle by Headquarter Toyota prior to sale. These may differ from additional optional items chosen by the customer after purchase. Dealer-installed options are not included in the advertised price unless otherwise stated. Advertised Pricing Vehicle images and accessories may vary by model. Pricing is subject to change without notice due to possible errors or omissions. Some new vehicle pricing may reflect manufacturer incentives that are time-sensitive and may require buyer qualification or financing through the manufacturer’s preferred lender. College Graduate and Military rebates are not included in the advertised price. Information regarding manufacturer incentives and vehicle features is provided by third-party sources and is accurate to the best of our knowledge at the time of publication. Please reach out to Headquarter Toyota via phone or email for complete incentive eligibility and vehicle availability. Prices do not include: Sales tax or other applicable taxes Title, registration, or license fees Government fees Tag agency/electronic registration filing fees $1,094 predelivery service charge All MPG estimates are based on EPA ratings and are for comparison purposes only. Actual mileage may vary depending on driving habits, conditions, and vehicle maintenance (especially on hybrid models). Selling Price The final selling price may vary based on vehicle color, installed accessories, and available manufacturer incentives at the time of sale. Prices can change without notice due to updates or corrections. College Graduate and Military rebates are not reflected in the listed pricing. Incentive and vehicle information is provided by third parties and is considered accurate as of publication. Please confirm availability and qualifications with Headquarter Toyota directly. All displayed information is compiled from sources believed to be reliable. However, no guarantee is made regarding completeness or accuracy. MPG ratings are estimates only, and real-world performance will vary. Copyrighted content provided by third parties may not be reproduced or redistributed without written permission. × Disclaimer New 2025 Toyota Corolla LE, Model: 1852. VIN: 5YFB4MDEXSP255435 (excludes Hybrid and Hatch). Price excludes tax, title, tags, registration, dealer documentation fee of $899, $199 electronic fees, $54.75 electronic registration, and $13 private tag agency fee (these charges represent costs and profit to the dealer for items such as inspecting, cleaning, and adjusting vehicles, and preparing documents related to the sale or lease), $695 acquisition fee and inception charges, and not including dealer added options if applicable. For well-qualified lessees with approved credit thru Southeast Toyota Finance. Not all lessees will qualify for this payment amount. Closed-end lease on New 2025 Toyota Corolla LE. Adding options increases payment. $89 per month for 36 months. $7,500 cash due at signing plus first month payment. No security deposit required. Monthly payments do not include applicable taxes. Lessee pays the remainder of maintenance after Toyota Care expires. Excess wear and use and $0.18 per mile over 12,000 miles per year. Disposition fee of $350 due at lease end. May not be combined with any other offers. Available on new in-stock Toyota vehicles only. Maximum contract is 36 months. Offer expires 1/31/2025. Close × Disclaimer *No down payment required. If you do not qualify for the offer, the amount and percentage of any down payment vary based on your credit qualification. **Payments may be deferred for the first 90 days through SETF with approved credit. Interest accrues from inceptions/contract date. **0% APR for 60 monthly payments of $16.67 for every $1,000 ­financed, and no down payment required if qualified for advertised offer. If you do not qualify for the offer, the amount and percentage of any down payment vary based on your credit qualification. APR offer example new 2024 Toyota BZ4X 2WD Limited with a TSRP of $43,0701. Must take delivery from dealer in stock inventory. Images for display purposes only. Offers may not be combined with certain other offers see dealer for details.
